Title: The Master
Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Price Carson, Mike Howard, Sarah Shoshana David
Plot: Returning from Navy service in World War II, Freddie Quell drifts through a series of breakdowns. Finally he stumbles upon a cult which engages in exercises to clear emotions and he becomes deeply involved with them.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 76 wins & 180 nominations.
